document_name: Amendment 1 to MOU Joint UN support for UN Coordination Specialist.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KGZ/Amendment 1 to MOU Joint UN support for UN Coordination Specialist.pdf

donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMA
outputs.output_descr: to develop and implement joint programmes, to monitor progress towards the Millennium Development Goals and Global Conferences, to assist the UNCT  to mainstream human rights and gender into its work and to engage with civil society, to assist agencies without country presence to access national systems and processes, and for national counterparts to access the expertise of agencies without country presence. More effective coordination and harmonization of UN Programmes and activities in especially vital in the  light of ongoing UN reforms, and the Coordination Specialist will significantly enhance this coordination capacity.

project_descr: The UN Coordination Specialist, in support of the UN RC will reinforce the capacity of the UNCT to support development, M&E of national strategies and commitments, to backstop UN system support for implementation of the CDS
project_title: Joint UN Support for UN Coordination Specialist
